name: I, Have Ray Gun
description:
I, HAVE RAY GUN Is finally on iOS! Our studios have merged with FALLEN APPS to bring you the latest & greatest 3D GAMING!

Journey into this full 3D world of action packed gaming! Equipped with a fully detailed powerful RAY GUN, you must blast your way though zombie hordes as they spawn! Move around the 3D world by swiping to move forward, back, left, or right. Tap the screen to shoot your ray gun at zombie astronauts!

FEATURES
* POWERFUL RAY GUN BLASTER
* ZOMBIE ASTRONAUTS IN SPACE
* SMOOTH 3D GAMING
* 3D OPEN WORLD MAP
* SWIPE TOUCH TO MOVE / MULTI TAP FOR RAPID SHOOTING
* UNIVERSAL APP
* NO IN APP PURCHASE

Great for all ages! DOWNLOAD NOW !
